# List All App Screenshots for an App Screenshot Set

**Web Service Endpoint**

List all ordered screenshots in a screenshot set.

## Listing and Reordering All Screenshots in a Set

- **Get All App Screenshot IDs for an App Screenshot Set**: Get the ordered screenshot IDs in a screenshot set.
- **Replace All App Screenshots for an App Screenshot Set**: Change the order of the screenshots in a screenshot set.
